MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. We are on site connecting generators, and we now expect all supplies to be restored by 10.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:18pm on Wednesday, 03 March 2021
